Title: Prohibits the transfer of unexpended moneys from funds receiving moneys from a dedicated fee into any other fund
Summary: Prohibits the transfer of unexpended moneys from funds receiving moneys from a dedicated fee into any other fund.
LawCode: Add ยง73-a, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting the transfer of unexpended moneys from funds receiving moneys from a dedicated fee into any other fund
